---
title: "Schedule"
output: html_document
---

```{r generate_calendar, eval = TRUE, echo=FALSE}
## load library
library(toastui)

## data frame with dates & topics
cal_data<-read.csv("calendar_data.csv")

## display calendar
calendar(cal_data, navigation = TRUE, view="week", defaultDate = Sys.Date()) %>%
  cal_week_options(
    startDayOfWeek  = 1, 
    workweek = TRUE
  )
    
```
